submission:
class Solution:
    def maxOperations(self, s: str) -> int:
        s = list(s)
        while s and s[-1] == '1':
            s.pop()
        grpSize = []
        r = 0
        n = len(s)
        while r < n:
            if s[r] == '0':
                r+=1
                continue
            currSize = 0
            while r < n and s[r] == '1':
                r += 1
                currSize += 1
            grpSize.append(currSize)
            r += 1
        c = 0
        res = 0
        for i in grpSize:
            c += i
            res += c
        return res
